sections.text: Indictment for driving while intoxicated; amendmentAn indictment which charges operating a vehicle while intoxicated may be amended at any time prior to commencement of the trial to charge a second, third, or fourth offense thereof regardless of whether such second, third, or fourth offense occurred before or after an earlier conviction of operating a vehicle while intoxicated.Added by Acts 1978, No. 682, ยง2.
